price: ‹ ߟߎ߯ߕߌ߫ › ߞߊ߲߫߸ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߠߊ߫ ߟߏ߲ߟߊ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߢߌ߲߬ ߠߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߖߊ߰ߣߌ߲߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߒ ߞߎ߲߬ߘߐߦߌ߬ߘߊ߬
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna hāulāi ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūni
